product_name: Edelweiss Flashlight II 10mm X 60m Dry Rope
long_description: The EDELWEISS Flashlight II 10mm X 60m Dry Rope features the right balance of suppleness and reassuring handling for long days of climbing at the sport crag or on an alpine peak.
short_description: The EDELWEISS Flashlight II 10mm X 60m Dry Rope features the right balance of suppleness and reassuring handling for long days of climbing at the sport crag or on an alpine peak.
